hero.title: Start
hero.description: With Dinamo, reach anywhere or the airport faster and safer, straight from your city. Transparent prices, zero surprises. Travel with total peace of mind — speed, comfort, and safety, all in one ride.

service.title: Best
service.description: Your trip with Dinamo begins with confidence and comfort. We provide essential transportation services that ensure you reach your destination safely, on time, and without any worries.

instant.title: Instant Booking
instant.desc: Travel between cities and governorates comfortably and safely

scheduled.title: Scheduled Booking
scheduled.desc: Plan your trips early and book easily

airport.title: Airport Rides
airport.desc: Stay on time and never miss your flight with pre-booking

guide.title: We’ve Got You Covered
guide.description: Your airport trip is no joke. With Dynamo, we make sure you arrive right on time without stress or worries. From the moment you book until you reach your destination, everything is calculated to the minute.
features: ✔️ Safety and comfort throughout the journey

1.title: Download the app
1.desc: The app is available on mobile in seconds.

3.title: Book your ride
3.desc: Choose your trip and be assured you'll arrive on time.

getApp.getForFree: Download the app and enjoy the service
getApp.availableOn: Whether from the airport or another city, we guarantee your comfort and safety.

reviews.title: Customer Reviews
reviews.description: With Dinamo, your travel is safe and comfortable without worrying about schedules. People have tried our services from airport trips to intercity rides, and they all agree that Dynamo is the choice that arrives on time.

sara.name: Sara
sara.comment: Offline maps are amazing, very useful.

fatima.name: Fatima
fatima.comment: I love the augmented reality features.
